contactParagraph: Any questions or suggestions? Get in contact with me!

aboutPage.intro: My name is Danny Koppenhagen and  I am a passionate software developer and IT consultant. My profession is the development of web applications – especially of single page applications (SPA). My technology stack includes mainly Angular, RxJS, NgRx but also Vue.js and NativeScript. Furthermore I develop Node.js backends based on JavaScript and TypeScript. I am a IT consultant for web-architectures and -frameworks. During the development I am very focussed on the user experience (UX).

0.info: Informatics, telecommunication technology and electrical engineering

1.where: Deutsche Telekom Technischer Service GmbH (Customer Competence Center)
1.info: Second level support for VoIP and WLAN products.

2.what: Bachelor of Engineering (Computer Science and Telecommunications)
2.where: Deutsche Telekom Hochschule für Telekommunikation (University of Applied Science)
2.info: Network and transfer technologies, software engineering, IT architecture, protocol engineering as well as web and media technologies.

3.where: Deutsche Telekom Healthcare & Security Solutions GmbH
3.info: Implementation of client- server architectures in the TETRA-BOS infrastructure. Administration, configuration, integration and test of IT systems.

4.info: First edition of the German book: "Angular: Grundlagen, fortgeschrittene Techniken und Best Practices mit TypeScript".

5.info: Development of UX centered enterprise web applications. Consulting and implementation of web applications and -architectures and UX consulting.

6.info: Second edition of the German book: "Angular: Grundlagen, fortgeschrittene Themen und Best Practices – inklusive NativeScript und NgRx".
